items.title: 7-Zip
items.content_html: Version 24.09 published on 2024-11-29. The summary of changes are: The latest release includes updates for improved performance and compatibility across multiple platforms, including Windows, Linux, and macOS. Additional installer options are provided for various system architectures. This release also features bug fixes and optimizations for the 7z format handling.

items.title: awscli2
items.content_html: Version 2.24.13 published on 2023-10-27. The summary of changes are: Latest update includes documentation changes, API support for Application Signals, enhancements to AWS Batch and CloudFront VPC origin config, and rolling updates for SageMaker InferenceComponents.

items.title: azurecli
items.content_html: Version 2.69.0 published on 2023-02-11. The summary of changes are: Azure CLI 2.69.0 includes updates and bug fixes to enhance stability and usability. For detailed release notes, refer to the Azure CLI documentation.

items.title: bicepcli
items.content_html: Version v0.33.93 published on 2025-01-29. The summary of changes are: This release addresses language server crashes, deployment failures with looped resources, and promotes the Deployment Pane as a stable feature.

items.title: bruno
items.content_html: Version v1.39.1 published on 2025-02-20. The summary of changes are: This release includes improved worker threads for file parsing, updated templates for bug reporting and feature requests, and various minor fixes to enhance the overall user experience.

items.title: clink
items.content_html: Version 1.7.10 published on 2023-02-07. The summary of changes are: Introduced new Lua API for Unicode handling and a diagnostic command for troubleshooting improvements. Resolved potential crash issues with console width and enhanced internal diagnostic clarity.

items.title: dbeaver
items.content_html: Version 24.3.5 published on 2025-02-16. The summary of changes are: The latest release includes various bug fixes and enhancements to improve stability and performance. It is free, open-source, and now available for download. This ensures seamless database management across multiple platforms.

items.title: dive
items.content_html: Version v0.12.0 published on 2024-02-02. The summary of changes are: Includes features for Docker layer vulnerability scanning and GitLab CI secure usage, fixes compatibility with Docker 25+, and updates dependencies for improved security.

items.title: docker-desktop
items.content_html: Version 4.38.0 published on 2025-01-30. The summary of changes are: Introduced multi-node Kubernetes clusters and independent updates for key components without restarting Docker Desktop. Bake is now generally available with entitlements and composable attributes. Bug fixes addressed token refresh, container creation, and UI issues across platforms.

items.title: Buiild Apps SDK
items.content_html: Version 6.0.428 published on November 12, 2024. The summary of changes are: The latest stable release of Build Apps SDK for .NET 6.0 includes updated language support and enhanced runtime capabilities.

items.title: Build Apps SDK
items.content_html: Version 8.0.406 published on February 11, 2025. The summary of changes are: This release updates the .NET 8 SDK to version 8.0.406, including support for C# 12.0, F# 8.0, and Visual Basic 16.9. It also includes the latest runtime improvements for building and running .NET applications.

items.title: drawio
items.content_html: Version 26.0.16 published on 2025-02-24. The summary of changes are: Updates to draw.io core v26.0.16 with integration of electron 34.2.0, incorporating all changes from the previous build.

items.title: etlp2pcapng
items.content_html: Version v1.11.0 published on 2023-06-08. The summary of changes are: Improved handling of pktmon captures for enhanced performance and stability.

items.title: ffmpeg
items.content_html: Version 7.1 published on 2024-09-30. The summary of changes are: FFmpeg 7.1 'PÃ©ter' introduces updates from the 7.1 branch with improved library versions and latest enhancements for multimedia processing.

items.title: gateway
items.content_html: Version 2024.3.3 published on 2025-02-13. The summary of changes are: The Gateway 2024.3.3 is out with minor updates.

items.title: git-win
items.content_html: Version 2.48.1 published on 2025-02-13. The summary of changes are: This release introduces Git v2.48.1, includes updates to MinTTY and the MSYS2 runtime, and defaults to the Windows-native HTTPS transport backend for new installations.

items.title: cli
items.content_html: Version v1.53.0 published on 2025-02-14T15:20:04Z. The summary of changes are: Documented the GLAB_CHECK_UPDATE environment variable and implemented several features including the 'glab ci cancel' command and the '--raw' option for 'mr diffs'.

items.title: gitlab release cli
items.content_html: Version v0.22.0 published on 2025-02-17. The summary of changes are: Merged 'release-0-22-0' branch into 'master' with various enhancements.

items.title: gitlab-runner-agent
items.content_html: Version v17.9.0 published on 2025-02-20. The summary of changes are: Updated CHANGELOG for v17.9.0 release.

items.title: golang
items.content_html: Version 1.24.0 published on unknown. The summary of changes are: The latest release, version 1.24.0, introduces general improvements and bug fixes. Additional features further optimize performance and streamline the developer experience.

items.title: golang1.21
items.content_html: Version 1.21.13 published on 2024-08-06. The summary of changes are: This release includes fixes to the go command, the covdata command, and the bytes package.

items.title: golang1.22
items.content_html: Version 1.22.12 published on 2025-02-04. The summary of changes are: Includes security fixes to the crypto/elliptic package alongside bug fixes to the compiler and the go command.

items.title: golang1.23
items.content_html: Version 1.23.6 published on 2025-02-04. The summary of changes are: Includes security fixes to the crypto/elliptic package and bug fixes to the compiler and the go command.

items.title: helm
items.content_html: Version v3.17.1 published on 2025-02-12. The summary of changes are: Helm v3.17.1 is a patch release that includes minor fixes and improvements. Users are encouraged to upgrade for a better experience. Discussions and contributions can be made via Kubernetes Slack and public calls.

items.title: inkscape
items.content_html: Version 1.4 published on 2024-10-13. The summary of changes are: Inkscape 1.4 introduces a filter gallery with previews, modular grids, improved swatches handling, and a new font browser. It also adds features such as Affinity Designer file import, customizable handles, faster extensions, and a new icon set with over 500 icons. The release includes numerous enhancements and bug fixes for an improved user experience.

items.title: IntelliJ IDEA
items.content_html: Version 2024.3.3 published on 2025-02-12. The summary of changes are: This update improves Maven project synchronization, enhances screen reader detection on Windows startup, and fixes custom toolbar icon persistence.

items.title: jmeter
items.content_html: Version 5.6.3 published on 2024-01-07. The summary of changes are: This release includes improvements, bug fixes, and refinements to enhance performance and stability.

items.title: jq
items.content_html: Version 1.7.1 published on 2023-12-13. The summary of changes are: Fixes for multiple vulnerabilities and stability improvements, including buffer overflow and JSON parsing updates. Enhancements in CLI usability, memory leak handling, and support for OpenBSD. Various optimizations for performance, usability, and conformity to JSON standards.

items.title: kubectl
items.content_html: Version 1.32.2 published on 2025-02-11. The summary of changes are: The latest release, 1.32.2, includes critical updates and patches to enhance platform stability and security. This version focuses on reliability improvements, ensuring better compatibility and performance. Detailed changelog information is available in the release schedule document.

items.title: make-win
items.content_html: Version 3.81 published on 2006-11-25. The summary of changes are: This release focuses on enhancing the automation of generating executables and updates only files affected by source code changes. It brings improved file dependency resolution and provides broader compatibility across multiple programming languages. Additionally, it adds better support for package installation and other repetitive tasks.

items.title: maven
items.content_html: Version 3.9.9 published on 2025-02-26. The summary of changes are: Apache Maven 3.9.9 is the latest release, recommended for all users, featuring the newest enhancements and bug fixes. It ensures compatibility with JDK 8+ and allows building against older JDK versions using toolchains. The release emphasizes stability and performance improvements.

items.title: miniconda
items.content_html: Version 25.1.1-2 published on 2025-02-11. The summary of changes are: This release includes the updated conda-anaconda-tos version 0.1.2 and offers bug fixes for improved stability and performance.

items.title: node
items.content_html: Version 20.18.3 published on 2025-02-10. The summary of changes are: This release includes performance enhancements, updates to npm version 10.8.2, and stability improvements for the Iron LTS branch.

items.title: Node.js
items.content_html: Version 16.20.2 published on 2023-08-08. The summary of changes are: This release, codenamed Gallium, includes critical updates and patches to ensure stability and security for Active LTS users.

items.title: node18
items.content_html: Version v18.20.7 published on 2025-02-20. The summary of changes are: The release includes the latest updates and stability improvements for the Node.js 18 branch. It is an Active LTS release and recommended for production environments. Critical bugs and patches are addressed in this version.

items.title: node20
items.content_html: Version 20.18.3 published on 2025-02-10. The summary of changes are: This stable version includes critical updates and bug fixes, improving compatibility and performance.

items.title: node22
items.content_html: Version 22.14.0 published on 2025-02-11. The summary of changes are: Updated to the latest stable release with critical improvements and minor bug fixes.

items.title: notepad-plus-plus
items.content_html: Version 8.7.7 published on 2025-02-07. The summary of changes are: The release of v8.7.7 addresses regression issues with SCN_MODIFIED notification events and introduces a new API (NPPM_ADDSCNMODIFIEDFLAGS) to resolve plugin-related problems.

items.title: openshift
items.content_html: Version 4.17.0-okd-scos.0 published on 2024-12-16. The summary of changes are: The release includes artifacts copied from the okd-scos repo, with a pre-configured openshift-install binary and client tooling enhancements. It offers updated component versions like Kubernetes 1.30.6 and machine-os 417.9.202412022032-0. Upgrade notes are provided specifically for transitioning from OKD 4.15 clusters.

items.title: oraclejdk11
items.content_html: Version 11.0.26 published on 2025-01-21. The summary of changes are: JDK 11.0.26 introduces IANA time zone data version 2024b, new debugging options with timestamps and threads, and fixes critical bugs including stability for Wayland systems.

items.title: oraclejdk17
items.content_html: Version 17.0.14 published on 2025-01-21. The summary of changes are: This release includes timezone updates (IANA 2024b), critical bug fixes, enhanced security baselines, and an updated string concatenation mechanism.

items.title: oraclejdk21
items.content_html: Version 21.0.6 published on 2025-01-21. The summary of changes are: JDK 21.0.6 includes the IANA Time Zone Data 2024b, improves historical data for several regions, and contains critical security fixes and updates.

items.title: oraclejdk8
items.content_html: Version 8u441 published on unknown. The summary of changes are: JDK 8u441 is the latest General Availability (GA) release, providing critical updates and performance improvements across the platform. It includes fixes introduced in previous BPR builds to enhance system stability. This version is recommended for all users of JDK 8.

items.title: powershell
items.content_html: Version 7.5.0 published on 2023-01-23. The summary of changes are: This release includes updates to .NET SDK 9.0.102, added support for publishing packages, improved build processes, and enhanced documentation with updated HelpInfoUri.

items.title: putty
items.content_html: Version 0.83 published on 2025-02-08. The summary of changes are: This release includes the latest stable updates and fixes for PuTTY, ensuring improved functionality and stability across all supported platforms.

items.title: python
items.content_html: Version 3.13.2 published on 2025-02-04. The summary of changes are: Includes bugfixes and improvements to enhance performance and stability for Python applications.

items.title: python3.10
items.content_html: Version 3.10.16 published on 2024-12-03. The summary of changes are: This is a security release for Python 3.10, providing essential updates and fixes to ensure long-term stability and security.

items.title: python3.11
items.content_html: Version 3.11.11 published on 2024-12-03. The summary of changes are: This release includes numerous security updates and bug fixes, ensuring the stability and reliability of the Python 3.11 branch.

items.title: python3.12
items.content_html: Version 3.12.9 published on 2025-02-04. The summary of changes are: This release includes bug fixes, performance improvements, and security updates to ensure stability and reliability for Python 3.12 users.

items.title: python3.9
items.content_html: Version 3.9.21 published on 2024-12-03. The summary of changes are: This release includes important security fixes and general performance improvements for Python 3.9. It ensures the stability and reliability of applications using this version. Upgrading to this version is strongly recommended.

items.title: rider
items.content_html: Version 2024.3.5 published on 2025-02-07. The summary of changes are: Rider 2024.3.5 includes a fix for the Go to Class feature and introduces improved cloud completion models for C#. It also adds support for Claude AI models in JetBrains AI Assistant, enhancing performance and reliability.

items.title: screentogif
items.content_html: Version 2.41.1 published on 2024-09-08. The summary of changes are: Updated Chinese, Turkish, Arabic, and Dutch localizations. Fixed issues with Move Left/Right commands and other minor bugs. Improved the stop recording message.

items.title: task
items.content_html: Version v3.41.0 published on 2025-01-18. The summary of changes are: Fixed several bugs including issues with dynamic variables, concurrent map writes, and template functions. Added new features like TASK_DIR special variable and checksum/timestamp variable accessibility. Updated installation methods and refactored internal implementations.

items.title: terraform
items.content_html: Version 1.10 published on Not Provided. The summary of changes are: The latest stable release includes various updates and bug fixes, improving provider installation and backend configurations. Enhancements include support for mocked and overridden values during test runs. Refer to changelogs for detailed information on previous versions.

items.title: vscode
items.content_html: Version 1.97.2 published on 2025-02-13. The summary of changes are: This update addresses critical issues. For detailed notes, visit Updates on code.visualstudio.com.

items.title: windows-terminal
items.content_html: Version 1.22.10352.0 published on 2023-02-06. The summary of changes are: Windows Terminal 1.22 introduces a rewritten console hosting implementation, improved support for grapheme clusters, and provides a stable base for the future of ConPTY-related advancements.

items.title: winmerge
items.content_html: Version 2.16.46 published on 2025-01-27. The summary of changes are: This is a stable release with multiple bug fixes, enhancements to folder comparison, plugin adjustments, and updated translations in various languages.

items.title: wireshark
items.content_html: Version 4.4.5 published on . The summary of changes are: The latest stable release of Wireshark, which supersedes all previous releases.

items.title: yq
items.content_html: Version v4.45.1 published on 2025-01-12. The summary of changes are: Added support for creating parent directories when using --split-exp, updated dependencies, and included contributions from the community.
